name: Gang District
description:
Gang District is a local multiplayer shooter party game with a share screen mechanism. Pick up a weapon and start blasting and kick some tail!

Gang District has NO online gameplay yet. It is only played localy.

It has 20+ weapons and 10 maps at this stage.

Weapons are randomly spawning at specific locations with a percentage chance for each weapon to spawn. While maps are selectable at any time of the game.

There are currently 4 mini boss weapons. If you are lucky enough, you might have them and win the game.

Gang District is developed by a sole developer.
